English: Supercurse: Afflicted enemies take#10% extra damage.
Japanese: Supercurse: Afflicted enemies take#20% extra damage.
Chinese: Supercurse: Afflicted enemies take#10% extra damage.

English: Superburn: Deals damage upon wearing off,#2x the damage of the hit that applied superburn.
Japanese: Superburn: Deals damage upon wearing off,#2x the damage of the hit that applied superburn.
Chinese: Superburn: Deals damage upon wearing off,#2x the damage of the hit that applied superburn.

English: Sparkle-Sparkle: Deal 30% more damage.#Wears off when you use an attack.
Japanese: Sparkle-Sparkle: Deal 30% more damage.#Wears off when you use an attack.
Chinese: Sparkle-Sparkle: Deal 30% more damage.#Wears off when you use an attack.

English: Brickskin: Shields you from damage once.#Slows movement to a minimum, #increases damage by 30%,#and lasts until you use an attack.
Japanese: Brickskin: Shields you from damage once.#Slows movement to a minimum, #increases damage by 30%,#and lasts until you use an attack.
Chinese: Brickskin: Shields you from damage once.#Slows movement to a minimum, #increases damage by 30%,#and lasts until you use an attack.

English: Blackmoon: Your next attack deals#100% extra damage.#Prevents you from using your Primary.
Japanese: Blackmoon: Your next attack deals#100% extra damage.#Prevents you from using your Primary.
Chinese: Blackmoon: Your next attack deals#100% extra damage.#Prevents you from using your Primary.

English: Bluemoon: Your next attack deals#100% extra damage.#Prevents you from using your Secondary.
Japanese: Blackmoon: Your next attack deals#100% extra damage.#Prevents you from using your Secondary.
Chinese: Blackmoon: Your next attack deals#100% extra damage.#Prevents you from using your Secondary.
